resources.string: Ethiopian primary health care clinical guidelines
Care of children 5-14 years and Adults 15 years or older in Health Centers

"MOH Access Agreement for EPHCG Users

 "In consideration of the mutual promises contained herein, the user agrees as follows:
" "MOH wishes to allow Users to have access to the EPHCG if and only if the user takes the following commands & responsibilities in to consideration:
" "This is not an ultimate guide for clinical care.
" "The physician or the user may found infrequent data miss on the application.
" "If the physician or the user finds any inconsistent in the data or care giving path, MOH will not take any responsibility. But is open for review and improvement of the app."
